collectible.title: Yuno's Extra Deck
collectible.subtitle: "Last Card!"
collectible.text: A deck of playing cards for an off-brand version of Uno, called Last Card. Don't forget to say "Last Card!" before playing your second-to-last one!
collectible.unlock: Finish a game against Yuno Katsugo to unlock this collectible, and his unique deck style.

collectible.title: Yuno's Friendship Photo
collectible.subtitle: Uno, Dos, Tres, Cuatro
collectible.text: A picture of Yuno and his closest friends - Ayumi, Gaku, and Yanagi. They've been through many things together, and although the game of Uno has its highs and lows, their friendship developed and endured through all their struggles. (Open the picture in a new window to see it full size.)
collectible.unlock: Finish a game with Yuno Katsugo and three other opponents who have blue, green, and purple hair.
